subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Musial, who played his entire career in St. Louis, won seven batting titles, hit 475 home runs, amassed 3,630 hits and was voted into the Hall of Fame in his first year of eligibility.
snippet: Mr. Musial, who played his entire career in St. Louis, won seven batting titles, hit 475 home runs, amassed 3,630 hits and was voted into the Hall of Fame in his first year of eligibility.
